title: American horror story freak show - freak women get revenge on penny's farther
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: I love the idea that Penny spared him. People may think she was being soft, but it was the total opposite. Now, he gets to live as a freak like she had to for the rest of his life, and now, he has to watch the freak he made live happily ever after, unlike he had planned.
"Wait, wait, wait, wait!......let me!" The best part of that scene
I like that Penny chose to be the bigger person in this, but I kind of wish she'd done that on her own terms and not because of Esmeralda.
They should have done that outside, that trailer is a mess now.

I cackled like a madman when they poured the tar on him and I love the fact that he now has to live as a freak with those burns and melted flesh never to be mended. But Penny is the only one who gets a happy life, and that is the BEST fucking revenge ever.
description:
American horror story freak show - freak women get revenge on penny's farther/ Esmerelda convenes them to stop 
4x8 Blood Bath
